name: Ex-Caliber
description:
You are King Arthur with an Arrow Shotgun trying to traverse a dungeon in order to reclaim the Holy Grail. Fight of hordes of goblins and ogres in order to advance to the next level. Defeat the final boss and get the Holy Grail to win the game!

Controls:

W/A/S/D to Move

Spacebar to Jump

Left-Click to Shoot

Devs:

Matthew Weiskotten - Programmer

Reece Sheehan - Programmer/Level Design

Alexander Turner - Enemy Design

Stanislav Mickelonis - Prop/Boss Design
